Question
========

To test the equality of two population averages using two independent samples, where the unknown population variances are are assumed equal, we use a

Answerlist
----------

* Z test
* Pooled T test
* F-test
* Paired T test

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Z test: Incorrect
* Pooled T-test: Correct
* F-test: Incorrect
* Paired T-test: Incorrect
